ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ نَتْلُوهُ عَلَيْكَ مِنَ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكْرِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is what We recite to you of the Signs and the wise Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: These verses that We read to you are signs and reminder full of wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What We recite to you consists of signs and wise admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), what we recite to you are revelations and words of wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are some verses that We recite to you, and advice full of wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is what We recite to you of the verses and the Wise Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This We recite to you of the communications and the wise reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This We recite to thee of signs and wise remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This (which) We recite unto thee is a revelation and a wise reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This which We recite to you is a revelation and a wise reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This which we recite unto thee is of the signs and of the wise admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: These that We recite to you are from the signs and the Wise Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is what we rehearse unto thee of the Signs and the Message of Wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is what We recite to you (O Muhammad SAW) of the Verses and the Wise Reminder (i.e. the Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This, We recite to you of the verses and the Wise Remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is what We recite to you of the Verses and the Wise Reminder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is what We recite to you, [O Muhammad], of [Our] verses and the precise [and wise] message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:58] This, what is mentioned of the matter of Jesus, We recite to you, narrate to you, O Muhammad (s), of verses and wise, clear, remembrance, namely, the Qur’ān (min al-āyāt, ‘of verses’ is a circumstantial qualifier referring to the [suffixed pronoun] hā’ of natlūhu, and its operator is the demonstrative import of dhālika, ‘this’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) that I have told you about, Muhammad, regarding the story of Jesus ((which) We recite unto thee) with which We send Gabriel to you (is a revelation) He says: they are revelations of the Qur'an, conveying commands and prohibitions (and a wise reminder) that enjoins what is lawful and what is unlawful; it is also said this means: it corroborates the Torah and the Gospel; and it is also said this means: it confirms that which is in the Guarded Tablet.
